QuestData.Title: First Contact
QuestData.Description: Time to put your new disguise to the test.$B$BYour first contact is Vanthir, a merchant from the common district. He is in the Grand Promenade today visiting one of his suppliers.$B$BTell Vanthir to pay me a visit regarding a shipment of dusk lily bulbs. He will understand.$B$BBeyond that, we will need time to prepare. You should return to Thalyssra.$B$B<Ly'leth hands you a corked bottle of faintly glowing fluid.>$B$BGive her this, with my regards. We will call upon you soon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vanthir in The Grand Promenade.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you made contact with our sympathizers?
QuestData.RewardText: The Lunastre family is well-connected. They will be of great help to us when the time comes.
